name: Metal Mutation
description:
Different types of weapons give you an invigorating fighting experience. Enjoy those stylish combat and flashy combos!
No matter you are an expert player or just a rookie, you may enjoy the fun of this game.DECISION MATTERSDoes the development of technology bring about a better life or the beginning of exploitation? Why are cyborg groups and metaverse humans separated? How do people survive under the monopoly of big corporations? How will your choices affect the development of the story?
When death is only the beginning, what secrets will be discovered after a rebirth?ULTIMATE ROGUELIKE EXPERIENCEMultiple decision-making gameplay brings you the fast-paced and high replay value experience. Enjoy the intense excitement of ‘One-Life Pass’ roguelike game.
Brave warriors who choose high-risk decisions will naturally reap high returns!UNIQUE MULTIPLAYER-ONLINE GAMEPLAYAfter clearing each chapter, you can enter ‘THE SHELTER’, in which you may cooperate with friends online to accumulate resources. Reduce your fear of restarting and firmly grasp your own autonomy.
After balancing the risks and benefits, make yourself fully prepared to continue challenging the next chapter!
Under the 2.5D perspective, the realistic background of hardcore sci-fi, together with the dramatic lighting creates a unique atmosphere. Exquisite mechanical devices, and oriental mysterious elements added to the details.
All present an extremely textured picture!
